EmailTemplate.subject: Info on Turbonomic leading up to meeting (1494851735.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Terry!I know we have a meeting scheduled this Thursday at 10am but I wanted to touch base prior in case you had any questions leading up to our meeting. We recently released a Video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_IGHTGVR6U&feature=youtu.be&utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=social-organic&utm_content=Oktopost-007xsnrlpzujk0y&utm_campaign=video-customer-success-bmc&utm_term=Turbonomic+%28Company%29]]> featuring the CIO at BMC and his success story with Turbonomic. Feel free to check that out leading up to the meeting, and I look forward to talking to you Friday. Best,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
